				orbit_angle = {
					min = 90
					max = 270
				}
				size = {
					min = 2
					max = 4
				}

				name = "Сенали-III"

				orbit_distance = 2
				orbit_angle = {
					min = 90
					max = 270
				}
				size = {
					min = 2
					max = 4
				}
			}
			moon = {
				name = "Сенали-IV"
				class = pc_barren
				orbit_distance = 2
				orbit_angle = {
					min = 90
					max = 270
				}
				size = {
					min = 2
					max = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

#Abregado-rae
abregado_rae_system_initializer = {
	name = "Абрегадо"
	class = "sc_m"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Анза"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Абрегадо-дай"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Абрегадо-сан"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Абрегадо-рей"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_abregado_rae
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Абрегадо-рей-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Абрегадо-фас"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Абрегадо-фас-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Абрегадо-фас-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Абрегадо-фас-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Абрегадо-фас-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Абрегадо-фас-IX"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Абрегадо-таки"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дентаал-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_continental

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		canon_map
	}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		name = "Меннаалии I"
		class = random_non_colonizable

			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}

		name = "Горман-Прайм"

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Горман"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_ghorman
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Горман-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			orbit_distance = 2

#Vanik
vanik_system_initializer = {
	name = "Вэник"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вэник"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 5

			min = 90
			max = 270

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1

			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}

			max = 25

			}

				max = 5

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

#Polith
polith_system_initializer = {
	name = "Полит"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полит"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Поликси"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Локсизра"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Локсизра-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Локсизра-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Локсизра-V"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тайферра"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_thyferra
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			add_deposit = d_bacta_materials_2
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_VratixPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Vratix_Republic"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_idealistic_foundation
							civic = civic_environmentalist
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:VratixSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = vratix_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Thyferra"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Тайферра A"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тайферра B"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Иквобал"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Иквобал-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Иквобал-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Иквобал-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Иквобал-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Иквобал-LIV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ренас"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Ренас-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

#Tauber
tauber_system_initializer = {
	name = "Таубер"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Таубер-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Таубер"
		class = pc_lake
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_flooded_mounds
			add_deposit = d_savage_wildlands
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Wroona
wroona_system_initializer = {
	name = "Вруна"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вруна-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вруна"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_wroona
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_WroonianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Wroona_Port_Authority"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_meritocracy
							civic = civic_technocracy
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:WroonianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_materialist"
						}
						#ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = wroona_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Wroona"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Vandelhelm
vandelhelm_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ванделхэлм"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ванделхэлм-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ванделхэлм"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_vandelhelm
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Ванделхэлм-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Ванделхэлм-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Ванделхэлм-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Ванделхэлм VII"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

		}

			max = 15

		name = "Циндрал VI"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

#Triton
triton_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тритон"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
		starport_start
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тритон-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

			max = 270
		}

			}

			max = 25
		}

				max = 5
			}

#Praesitlyn
praesitlyn_system_initializer = {
	name = "Прэситлин"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Прэситлин-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Прэситлин"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_praesitlyn
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Kaikielius
kaikielius_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кайкьелиус"
	class = "sc_k"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_koros_trunk_line
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кайкьелиус-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Кайкьелиус I"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кайкьелиус II"

		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

			name = "Кайкьелиус IIa"

	}

			min = 90
			max = 270

		orbit_distance = 100

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Кайкьелиус IVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Кайкьелиус IVb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Кайкьелиус IVc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Кайкьелиус IVd"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {

#Keeara Major
keeara_major_system_initializer = {
	name = "Большая Киара"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_koros_trunk_line
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Киара"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Большая Киара"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Spira
spira_system_initializer = {
	name = "Спира"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Спира-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Спира"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 30
			max = 60
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		name = "Примус Голууд"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = 15
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 60
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 90
	}

		name = "Примус Голууд I"
		class = pc_broken

			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = 15

			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {

			}

		}
	}
}

#Vulpter

	name = "Вульптер"

		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		name = "Вульптер-Прайм"

			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Вульпус"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кинс"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Кинс-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вульптер"
		class = pc_lake
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_VulptereenPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Vulpter_Port_Authority"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_technocracy
							civic = civic_mining_guilds
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:VulptereenSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_materialist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = vulptereen_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Vulpter"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нур"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Малый Вульп"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Большой Вульп"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Большой Вульп I"

# Thoadeye
thoadeye_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тоадей"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тоадей"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

#Columus
columus_system_initializer = {
	name = "Колумус"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Колумус-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Колумус I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

		radius = 170
	}

		type = crystal_asteroid_belt
		radius = 220
	}

			min = 3
			max = 4

			min = 10
			max = 25

			}

				max = 5
			}

		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Калист II"

		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

	}
	planet = {

		}

		}

	}

		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Калист V"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Калист VI"
		class = pc_outback
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

				modifier = bleak_planet
			}
		}

			name = "Калист VIa"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Калист VIb"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

#Tanjay

	name = "Танджей"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Танджей"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Танджей I"
		class = random_non_colonizable

		}

			max = 15

		}

	}

		class = star

			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Пантоломин"
		class = pc_desertislands
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Пантоломин-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Пантоломин-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Пантоломин-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Мир Джерво"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 15
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Толоран"
		class = pc_snow
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		modifiers = none
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Этлоран"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
}

		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Пирия"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {

			max = 35
		}

		name = "Пирия I"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30

		}
		size = {

			max = 15
		}

	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {

			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Пирия III"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Болейас"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_borleias
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_poor
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Черная луна"
			class = pc_molten
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Пирия V"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Пирия VI"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Пирия VIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Пирия VIb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Пирия VIc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Пирия VId"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}

#Ord Mirit
ord_mirit_system_initializer = {
	name = "Орд-Мирит"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Орд-Мирит-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

	name = "Вэйсд"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		dorin_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вэйсд-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вэйсд"
		class = pc_cascadian
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Вэйсд A"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Namadii
namadii_system_initializer = {
	name = "Намадии"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Намадии"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

#Norkronia
norkronia_system_initializer = {
	name = "Норкрония"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_metellos_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Норкрон"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

		class = swnd_random_colonizable

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}

		}

		}
	}
}

#Fre'ji
freji_system_initializer = {
	name = "Фрезия"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "Фре'джи"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Фреллор"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Фреллор-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фрезия"
		class = pc_desertislands
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Фрезия-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Фрезия-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Фрезия-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Фрезия-VII"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Френорис"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

		canon_map
	}

		name = "Галанд-Прайм"
		class = star

		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270

				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Tynna
tynna_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тиннани"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Тиннани"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тинна"
		class = pc_alpine
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_tynna
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_TynnanPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Tynnan_Central_Government"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_parliamentary_system
							civic = civic_meritocracy
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:TynnanSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = tynnan_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Tynna"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Ganthel
ganthel_system_initializer = {
	name = "Гантел"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Гантел-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			min = @ecumenopolis_min_size

		}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

				max = 5

#Tepasi
tepasi_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тепаси"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тепаси-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#map-notes Achtnak, Earthquakes
		name = "Тепаси"
		class = pc_forest
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_tepasi
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Caamas
caamas_system_initializer = {
	name = "Цириус"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Цириус"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Лис"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Каамас"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_caamas
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_CaamasiPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Caamasi_Territory"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_parliamentary_system
							civic = civic_free_haven
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:CaamasiSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = caamasi_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Caamas"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Каамор"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Каамор-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Сирилла"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Сирилла-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сирилла-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сирилла-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сирилла-XVII"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

#Pollillus
pollillus_system_initializer = {
	name = "Поллиллус"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Ваннелл"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Поллиллус"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#N'Zoth
nzoth_system_initializer = {
	name = "Н'зот"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "К'рел"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "К'зар"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Т'грель"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "В'роф a"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Г'хол"

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

			name = "Г'хол a"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

		name = "Н'зот"
		class = pc_arid

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}

			set_planet_flag = planet_nzoth

				max = 270

			}
		}

			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

	planet = {

			min = 1

#J't'p'tan

		name = "Доорник-628"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		name = "Доорник-628A"

#Ragoon
ragoon_system_initializer = {
	name = "Рагун"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Рагун"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Рагун I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

#Xa Fel
xa_fel_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кса Фел"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Сз Фел"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#minor, no portraits
		name = "Кса Фел"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_poor
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Hyabb
hyabb_system_initializer = {
	name = "Хьябб"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_hyabb
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Хьябб-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Хьябб"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Voon
voon_system_initializer = {
	name = "Вун"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вун-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вун"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Darada
darada_system_initializer = {
	name = "Дарада"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дарада-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дарада"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Thokos
thokos_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тхокос"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тхокос-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тхокос"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Thorgeld
thorgeld_system_initializer = {
	name = "Торгельд"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Торгельд"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 30
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Торгельд I"
		class = pc_med
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Торгельд II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Торгельд IIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Торгельд III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Торгельд IIIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Торгельд IIIb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Торгельд IV"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Торгельд IVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Торгельд IVb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Торгельд IVc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Торгельд IVd"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Торгельд V"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Velus
velus_system_initializer = {
	name = "Велус"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Велус"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Салфор"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Велусия"
		class = pc_desertislands
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		modifiers = none
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_velusia
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_AquarPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Aquar_Polity"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_mining_guilds
							civic = civic_efficient_bureaucracy
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:AquarSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = aquar_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Velusia"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Велусия-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Велусия-II"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Велумия"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Велумия-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Велумия-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Велумия-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Велумия-VII"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вилимия"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Вилимия-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Вилимия-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Вилимия-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Вилимия-XIII"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ийхтор"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
}

#Farrfin
farrfin_system_initializer = {
	name = "Фаррфин"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фаррфин-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фаррфин"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Kidiet Olgo
kidiet_olgo_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кидиет-Олго"

	planet = {
		name = "Кидиет"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

	planet = {
		name = "Кидиет-Олго"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

			min = @small_planet_min_size

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Vultar
vultar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Вультар"
	class = "sc_m"
	flags = {
		imperial_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вультар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 20
			max = 25
		}
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 60
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Вультар"
		class = pc_shattered
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 60
			max = 120
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = yes
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 120
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 220
	}
}

		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Балморра-Прайм"

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		name = "Балморра"
		class = pc_continental

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Балморра Vp"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Балморра VI"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Phemis
phemis_system_initializer = {
	name = "Фемис"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фемис-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фемис"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_phemis
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
			set_deposit = d_kyber_vein
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Shumogi
shumogi_system_initializer = {
	name = "Шумоги"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Шумоги-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Шумоги"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}
