#Balosar
balosar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Балосар"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "Балосар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Балосар I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Балосар II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар IIa"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Балосар"
		class = pc_nuked
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_balosar
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = pm_polluted
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Балосар IV"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар IVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар IVb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар IVc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар IVd"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар IVe"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Балосар V"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар Va"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Балосар Vb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

			max = 270

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			max = 270

	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Туманность Оссорка"
		class = "pc_nebula_red"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
}

			max = 270

	}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = 15

		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Таласеа"
		class = pc_forest
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_talasea
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

	name = "Ноквивзор"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Ноквивзор-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ноквивзор"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Devaron
devaron_system_initializer = {
	name = "Деварон"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Деварон-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Деварон"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Деварон-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Деварон-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_devaron
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_DevaronianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Devaronian_Participate"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_shadow_council
							civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:DevaronianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = devaronian_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Деварон"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

		}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90
				max = 270

		}

			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90

			}

				min = 2
				max = 5

#Contruum
contruum_system_initializer = {
	name = "Контруум"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Контруум-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#map-notes Borium
		name = "Контруум"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Контруум-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Контруум-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Kiribi

	name = "Кириби"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		arkanian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кириби-Прайм"

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кириби"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		}

# Kluistar
kluistar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Клюистар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		arkanian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Клюистар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Клюистар"
		class = pc_forest
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = dangerous_wildlife
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Gala
gala_system_initializer = {
	name = "Гала"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_salin_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Гала-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Гала"
		class = pc_mangrove
		orbit_distance = 90
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Гала-I"
			class = pc_frozen
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Гала-II"
			class = pc_frozen
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Гала-III"
			class = pc_frozen
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_gala
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_GalacianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Galan_Republic"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_parliamentary_system
							civic = civic_byzantine_bureaucracy
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:GalacianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = galacian_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Gala"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Денова"

		save_global_event_target_as = denova_system
	}

		name = "Денова-Прайм"
		class = star

		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

				min = 2
				max = 4

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 160
	}

	}

		name = "Луир"

		size = {

			max = 35

#Abron
abron_system_initializer = {
	name = "Аброн"
	class = "sc_m"
	planet = {
		name = "Абер"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Аброн I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Альферидиес"
		class = pc_subarctic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_alpheridies
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_MiralukaPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Miraluka_Refuge"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_beacon_of_liberty
							civic = civic_environmentalist
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:MiralukaSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
							ethic = "ethic_spiritualist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = miraluka_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Alpheridies"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Аброн III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Аброн IIIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Аброн IIIb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Аброн IV"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Аброн IVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Аброн IVb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Аброн IVc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Аброн IVd"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

				min = 90

#Thisspias

	name = "Тисспиас"

		name = "Тисспиас-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Тисспиас I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

			name = "Тисспиас IIa"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}

			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_zeltros
				entity = continental_thisspias_planet_01_entity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

				min = 90

			}

			}

#Katarr
katarr_system_initializer = {
	name = "Катарр"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Катарр-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Катарр"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Катарр-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			max = 35
		}

		name = "Драбун I"

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = 270

				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4

			class = pc_barren

				max = 4

#Aargonar
aargonar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ааргонар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_aargonar
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ааргонар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_desert

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			}
		}

			max = 4

			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

		}

	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нам Хориос"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Syngia
syngia_system_initializer = {
	name = "Сингия"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Сингия-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Сингия"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = dangerous_wildlife
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Луна Сингии"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			max = 25
		}

#Mirial
mirial_system_initializer = {
	name = "Мириал"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_mirial
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Мириал-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Мириал"
		class = pc_tundra
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_mirial
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_MirialanPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Mirialan_Commune"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_exalted_priesthood
							civic = civic_meritocracy
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:MirialanSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = mirialan_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Mirial"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Akiva

	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = akiva_system
	}

		name = "Акива-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1

				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

#Maridun
maridun_system_initializer = {
	name = "Маридун"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = maridun_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Звезда Маридуна"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Маридун"
		class = pc_prairie
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_maridun
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Near Indosa
near_indosa_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ближняя Индоса"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = near_indosa_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ближняя Индоса Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ближняя Индоса"
		class = pc_karst
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_poor
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

pinoora_system_initializer = {
	name = "Пиноора"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {

	}

		name = "Пиноора"
		class = star

		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Пиноора I"
		class = random_non_colonizable

#Denarii Station
denarii_station_system_initializer = {
	name = "Станция Денарии"
	class = "sc_nebula_green"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Денарии"
		class = "pc_nebula_green"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_green_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Станция Денарии"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_min_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

#Selitan
selitan_system_initializer = {
	name = "Селитан"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = selitan_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Селитан-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Селитан"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

	}

			max = 35

# Vaal
vaal_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ваал"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = vaal_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ваал-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ваал"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = dangerous_wildlife
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Луна Ваала"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			max = 10

			min = 90

		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

		class = random_asteroid

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

	}

		name = "Барисон-Прайм"

		}

			max = 3
		}

			max = 10

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

				max = 5

				min = 2
				max = 4

		}

# Mossak

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_stenos
	}

		name = "Стенос-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		name = "Стенос I"

		}

		name = "Элом-Прайм"

# Corbos
corbos_system_initializer = {
	name = "Корбос"
	class = "sc_g"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = corbos_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Корбос-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Корбос I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Корбос Ia"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 2

			}

				min = 90

			}

# Horuset (Korriban)
horuset_system_initializer = {
	name = "Хорусет"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Хорусет"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Шрам Коррибы I"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 2
			max = 4
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		name = "Шрам Коррибы II"

		orbit_distance = 0

			min = 2

			max = 15

# Dromund Kaas
dromund_system_initializer = {
	name = "Дромунд"
	class = "sc_b"
	planet = {
		name = "Дромунд"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Дромунд-Иксин"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дромунд-Калакар"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Калакар-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Калакар-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Калакар-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Калакар-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Калакар-V"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Калакар-VI"
			class = pc_searing
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#map-notes atmosphere heavily charged with electricity
		name = "Дромунд-Каас"
		class = pc_mangrove
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_dromund_kaas
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Каас-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Каас-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дромунд-Фелс"
		class = pc_med
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Луна Фелс"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дромунд-Тин"
		class = pc_barren_cold
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

	}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

				max = 4

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

	planet = {

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

kalsunor_system_initializer = {
	name = "Калсунор"
	class = "sc_f"
	planet = {
		name = "Калсунор-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Калсунор I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Калсунор Ia"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Калсунор"		# Kalsunor II
		class = pc_mesa
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_kalsunor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Калсунор III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

			}

			}

				min = 90
				max = 270

			}

	}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	planet = {
		name = "Зиост I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Зиост II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Зиост"
		class = pc_cascadian
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_ziost
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = nuked_planet_01_entity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Зиост a"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Зиост b"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Зиост IVb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Зиост IVc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

# Ferro
ferro_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ферро"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Ферро-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ферро"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_ferro
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_FerroanPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Ferroan_Territory"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_free_haven
							civic = civic_agrarian_idyll
						}
						authority = auth_imperial
						species = event_target:FerroanSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = ferro_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Ferro"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}

			add_modifier = {
				modifier = unstable_tectonics
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "Сембла-I"

			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

		}

			}

			}

# Peragus
peragus_system_initializer = {
	name = "Перагус"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Перагус"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Перагус I"
		class = pc_molten

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 105
	}

		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 50

			max = 270
		}

			max = 2

# Tiss'sharl
tisssharl_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тисс'шарл"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Тисс'шарл-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тисс'шарл"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_TissharPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_TissSharl_League"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_nationalistic_zeal
							civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:TissharSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = tissshar_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Tiss'Sharl"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Тисс'шарл I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тисс'шарл I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_glacial
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = dangerous_wildlife
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = hazardous_weather
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Оррон IIIc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Оррон IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Оррон V"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15

# Faarlsun
faarlsun_system_initializer = {
	name = "Фарлсун"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		amoeba_1_system
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					settings = {
						garrison = yes
					}
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						set_formation_scale = 3
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фарлсун"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Джун"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Векен"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		}
		has_ring = no

		moon = {
			name = "Почи-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Почи-II"

			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

# Mytus
mytus_system_initializer = {
	name = "Майтус"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус V"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус VI"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Майтус VII"
		class = pc_hadesert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_mytus
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			max = 3
		}

			min = 90

				max = 5

# Hiit
hiit_system_initializer = {
	name = "Хиит"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		csa_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Хиит-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Маал"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Маал-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Маал-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Маал-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Маал-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Хиит"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			}

			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нилгеймон"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = "toxic_planet_01_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

# Umbara
umbara_system_initializer = {
	name = "Умбара"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Умбара-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Умбара"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_umbara
				entity = tropical_umbara_planet_01_entity
			}
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_umbara
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_UmbaranPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Umbaran_Rootai_Council"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_shadow_council
							civic = civic_aristocratic_elite
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:UmbaranSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = cis_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = umbaran_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Umbara"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

nazzri_system_initializer = {
	name = "Наззри"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Наззри-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Наззри"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Togoria

		name = "Танос-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Тогория"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_togoria
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Тогория-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тогория-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Танос"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Charros
charros_system_initializer = {
	name = "Чаррос"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		drone_home_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Чаррос-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
		init_effect = {
			create_drone_country = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Чаррос"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_charros
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	change_orbit = 30
	planet = {
		count = 3
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 70
		init_effect = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Mining_Corps"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:drone_country
					while = {
						count = 12
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 3
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
						}
					}
					set_location = {
						target = prev
						distance = 20
						angle = 0
					}
					set_formation_scale = 2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 200
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Asset_Protection_Unit"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:drone_country
					while = {
						count = 10
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
						}
					}
					set_location = {
						target = prev
						distance = 20
						angle = 180
					}
					set_formation_scale = 2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 200
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:ore_grinder
					}
				}
				set_planet_flag = ore_grinder_planet
				set_deposit = d_minerals_10
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Central_Processing"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						create_ship = {
							name = "NAME_Ore_Grinder"
							design = "NAME_Drone_Home_Base"
							# graphical_culture = "drone"
						}
						set_location = prev
						save_event_target_as = ore_grinder
						set_fleet_flag = ore_grinder
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				create_mining_station = {
					owner = event_target:drone_country
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#############

			max = 15

				max = 270
			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Йисао"
		class = random_non_colonizable

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Валгаут"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size

			modifier = sy_ootmian_pabol
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Гиндин-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist

			max = 3
		}

			max = 10
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90

# Zaloriis
zaloriis_system_initializer = {
	name = "Залориис"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tiyanki_home_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		create_tiyanki_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant
			}
			save_event_target_as = giant
			event_target:tiyanki_country = {
				save_event_target_as = tiyanki_country2
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_1 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_2 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_3 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_4 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_5 = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Залориис-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Залориис"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

		}

			max = 270

				max = 5
			}

			max = 270

			max = @normal_planet_max_size

			add_deposit = d_harvester_fields
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			max = 4
		}

			max = 25

	name = "Новый Эпсолон"

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_ootmian_pabol
		}
	}

		name = "Новый Эпсолон Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

		}

			name = "Новый Эпсолон I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Новый Эпсолон II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

				min = 2

		}

			max = 4

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			}

				max = 5
			}

		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

			min = 30
			max = 30
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Блимф"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Блимф-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Блимф-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			size = {

				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Артезия"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

# Sev Tok
sev_tok_system_initializer = {
	name = "Сев Ток"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Сев Ток Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Сев Ток"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = unstable_tectonics
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		canon_map
		hapan_nebula
	}
	planet = {
		name = "К'Фарри-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "К'Фарри"
		class = pc_cascadian
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "К'Фарри a"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			max = 25
		}

				max = 2
			}

				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
