# Millinar
millinar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Миллинар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hapan_start_system
		canon_map
		hapan_nebula
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Миллинар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Миллинар"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			modifier = sy_gamor_run
		}
	}

				max = 5

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

			max = 35
		}

			max = 3
		}

			max = 10
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "Шадор-II"

				min = 2

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Иктотчон-XVI"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

	name = "Хрома Зед"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Хрома Зед Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Хрома Зед"
		class = pc_cascadian
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}

	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size

		}

	}
	planet = {

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

		}

			max = 270
		}
	}

# Rishi
rishi_system_initializer = {
	name = "Риши"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "Риши-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Риши"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_rishi
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Спутник Риши"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

# Ukio
ukio_system_initializer = {
	name = "Юкио"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Юкио-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Юкио"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_ukio
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = lush_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Юкио a"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Sy Myrth
sy_myrth_system_initializer = {
	name = "Си-Мирт"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Си-Мирт-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Си-Мирт"
		class = pc_ecumenopolis_ruined
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @ecumenopolis_min_size
			max = @ecumenopolis_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_sy_myrth
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 20
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

			max = 35
		}
	}

			max = 3
		}

			max = 10

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_wetswamp
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_jabiim
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = weak_magnetic_field
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Адуба-Vc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Адуба-VI"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Адуба-VIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teth
teth_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тет"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тет"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Уэнес"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Харс"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Харс-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Харс-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Харс-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

		name = "Тет"

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_teth
			add_deposit = d_teth_palace
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Тет-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тет-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Алина"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Алина-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {

			}

				max = 5

barab_system_initializer = {
	name = "Бараб"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бараб"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Бараб I"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = irradiated_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бараб II"

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25

			name = "Бараб IIIa"

			size = {
				min = 2

				min = 90

				min = 90
				max = 270

				min = 2

			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Пенидес"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Сайврис"
			class = swnd_random_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Майк"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		canon_map

			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

				max = 5
			}

		}

# Tatooine
tatoo_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тату"
	class = "sc_tatooine"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тату I"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 10
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 0
			max = 360
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Тату II"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = 180
		size = 15
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Татуин"
		class = pc_sandsea
		orbit_distance = 90
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_tatooine
			add_deposit = d_mos_eisley
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = desert_tatooine_planet_01_entity
			}
			while = {
				count = 12
				generate_BomarrPop = yes
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Гомрассен"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Гермесса"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Шенини"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 200
	}
	change_orbit = 50
	planet = {
		name = "Железная планета"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Звезда Джаббы"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Оханн"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Оханн-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Оханн-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "Оханн-III"

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "Адриана-I"

# Ando
ando_system_initializer = {
	name = "Андо"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "Андо"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Андандо"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Андо"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_ando
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_AqualishPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Ando_Polity"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_mining_guilds
							civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:AqualishSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = aqualish_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Ando"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Андо-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Андо-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Андо-Прайм"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ando-Секунда"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 4
			max = 4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Kamino
kamino_system_initializer = {
	name = "Камино"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Камино"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Кас"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			create_pirate_country = yes
			event_target:pirate_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Pirate_Fleet"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Skull"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Corsair"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Black_Earl"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 1
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_pirate_invincible"
								graphical_culture = "misc_01"
							}
						}
						set_location = prevprev
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Большой Юка"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Джомон"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фаа"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Фаа A"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Фаа B"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Камино"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_kamino
			}
			set_planet_flag = planet_kamino
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = hazardous_weather
			}
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_KaminoanPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Kaminoan_Ruling_Council"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_meritocracy
							civic = civic_technocracy
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:KaminoanSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_materialist"
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = kaminoan_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Kamino"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Кораса"
			class = pc_arctic
			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90

				min = 2

			}
		}

# Austan
austan_system_initializer = {
	name = "Остан"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		rodian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Остан"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 175
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Argovia
argovia_system_initializer = {
	name = "Арговия"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Арговия-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Арговия"
		class = pc_hajungle
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = hazardous_weather
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Nar Kaaga
nar_kaaga_system_initializer = {
	name = "Нар-Каага"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нар-Каага-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нар-Каага"
		class = pc_wetswamp
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_nar_kaaga
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Айлайл"
		class = pc_forest
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

outland_transit_system_initializer = {
	name = "Удалённый транзит"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_shag_pabol
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Звезда удалённого транзита"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Удалённая транзитная станция"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Ганатх-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = pc_swamp

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_hyperfertile_valley
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

				max = 5

		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
	}

		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 70
	}
	change_orbit = 70
	planet = {
		name = "Ардос Ia"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

		name = "Ардос Ib"

		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}

		orbit_angle = 90
	}

		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Саккар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Саккар"
		class = pc_arctic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Nar Haaska
nar_haaska_system_initializer = {
	name = "Нар-Хааска"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нар-Хааска-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нар-Хааска"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Droxu
droxu_system_initializer = {
	name = "Сигнет"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Сигнет-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Сигнет"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Сигнет-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сигнет-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сигнет-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Дроксу"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			has_ring = yes
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сигнет-XVI"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

# Moralan
moralan_system_initializer = {
	name = "Моралан"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Моралан-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Моралан"
		class = pc_nuked_uncolonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = irradiated_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			max = 15

				max = 270

			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

# Kor Usilic

	name = "Кор Усилик"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Звезда Кор Усилик"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

		canon_map
	}

			max = 35
		}
	}

			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

	}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 160
	}

		name = "Мулатан IV"
		class = pc_gas_giant

			max = 270

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			size = {

			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

# Saki
saki_system_initializer = {
	name = "Саки"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Саки-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Сакия"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = high_gravity
			}
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_SakiyanPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Sakiyan_Hegemony"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_imperial_cult
							civic = civic_functional_architecture
						}
						authority = auth_imperial
						species = event_target:SakiyanSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = hutt_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = sakiyan_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Sakiya"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Сакия-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 4
				max = 8
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кор Анджилиак"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 5

quesh_system_initializer = {
	name = "Куеш"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Куеш-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Куеш I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Куеш"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = pm_type_4_atmosphere_toxic
			}
		}
		entity = "toxic_planet_01_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Луна Куеша"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

				max = 4
			}

# Nimban
nimban_system_initializer = {
	name = "Нимбан"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нимбан-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Нимбан"
		class = pc_steppe
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_nimban
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_NimbanelPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Nimbanel_Polity"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_free_haven
							civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:NimbanelSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = hutt_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = nimbanel_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Nimban"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# The Maw
the_maw_system_initializer = {
	name = "Скопление Мау"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
		
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_kessel_run
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_leviathans = yes
			}
			set_star_flag = guardians_horror_system
			set_star_flag = guardian
			set_star_flag = hostile_system
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "A"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "B"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 15
			max = 20
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "C"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = {
			min = 30
			max = 30
		}
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "D"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = {
			min = 30
			max = 30
		}
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Станция скопления Мау"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "E"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 15
			max = 20
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "F"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Kessel
kessel_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кессель"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_kessel_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кесса"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Сенна"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кессель"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_kessel
				entity = arid_kessel_planet_01_entity
			}
			set_planet_flag = planet_kessel
			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit_2
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Гарнизонная луна"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 130
	}

		name = "Кессель IIIa"
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кессель IIIb"

		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {

			max = 270
		}

	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 2
				max = 5

		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = high_gravity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Klatooine
klatooine_system_initializer = {
	name = "Клатуин"
	class = "sc_k"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Клатуин-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Клатуин I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Клатуин Ia"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Клатуин"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_klatooine
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_KlatooinianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Klatooninian_State"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_slaver_guilds
							civic = civic_corvee_system
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:KlatooinianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_spiritualist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = klatooinian_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Klatooine"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Клатуин III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Клатуин IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Клатуин V"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Клатуин Va"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Клатуин Vb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Клатуин Vc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Клатуин Vd"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Клатуин Ve"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Клатуин Vf"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

				min = 2

			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Sriluur
sriluur_system_initializer = {
	name = "Шрилуур"
	class = "sc_k"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
		starport_start
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Шрилуур"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Чайтун"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = {
			min = 20
			max = 20
		}
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вейтун"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Алкру"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 150
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Линтра"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 70
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Линтра A"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Линтра B"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Шрилуур"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_sriluur
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
			add_deposit = d_active_volcano
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_WeequayPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Weequay_Haven"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_shadow_council
							civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:WeequaySpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = weequay_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Sriluur"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Шрилуур-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Руул"
			class = pc_tropical
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Шрилуур-III"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Шрилуур-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Кваи"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}
	}

		orbit_distance = 60

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 270

			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Komnor
komnor_system_initializer = {
	name = "Комнор"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_salin_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Комнор-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Комнор"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

# Jomark
jomark_system_initializer = {
	name = "Джомарк"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Джомарк-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = swnd_random_colonizable

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Джомарк-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Джомарк-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_angle = {

			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {

			min = 90
			max = 270

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

			}

				modifier = lush_planet
			}

			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

		}
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

	name = "Белдерон"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_salin_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Белдерон-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Белдерон"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_belderone
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "Белдерон-I"

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

		name = "Культис"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size

		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

# Kaelta

		canon_map
	}

		}

			max = 15
		}

	}

	}
	planet = {
		name = "Каелта III"
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Каелта IIIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Каелта IV"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Каелта IVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Каелта IVb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Каелта IVc"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90

			}

# Drongar
drongar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Дронгар"
	class = "sc_a"
	planet = {
		name = "Дронгар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дронгар"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_drongar
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Дронгар I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Дронгар II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 30
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			min = 90

		}

			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Лотхал IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

# Baros
baros_system_initializer = {
	name = "Барос"
	class = "sc_a"
	planet = {
		name = "Бари"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Барос"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = high_gravity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

			max = 15

		name = "Лекуа II"

				max = 5

		centrality_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дэла-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 2
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 1
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

		}

				max = 5

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {

				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270

		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1

				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}

			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

# Uaua
uaua_system_initializer = {
	name = "Уа"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		centrality_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Уа"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Уауа"
		class = pc_prairie
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Paulking
paulking_system_initializer = {
	name = "Полкинг"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг XIV"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг XV"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Полкинг XVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Полкинг XVb"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Полкинг XVc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Полкинг XVl"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полкинг XVI"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
