}

# Douglas
douglas_system_initializer = {
	name = "Дуглас"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Дуглас"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Дуглас I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дуглас II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дуглас III"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = dangerous_wildlife
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дуглас IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дуглас V"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Tund
tund_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тюнд"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Тюнд-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тюнд"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 10
						generate_ToongPop = yes
					}
					while = {
						count = 2
						generate_SithPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Toong_Hegemony"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_environmentalist
							civic = civic_functional_architecture
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:Toongspecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = toong_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Toong"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Malagarr
malagarr_system_initializer = {
	name = "Малагарр"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Малагарр-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Малагарр"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Gand
gand_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ганд"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Ганд"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ганд"
		class = pc_swamp
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}

			min = 2

		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270

				min = 90

				max = 5

			min = 90

		}
	}

# OHS1782-03
ohs1782_03_system_initializer = {
	name = "OHS1782-03"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "OHS1782-03"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Toong'l
toongl_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тунг'Л"

		name = "Тунг'Л-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тунг'Л"
		class = pc_nuked
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_swp_nuked
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Garel
garel_system_initializer = {
	name = "Гарел"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Гарел-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Гарел"
		class = pc_prairie
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Гарел-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Гарел-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Iego
iego_system_initializer = {
	name = "Иего"
	class = "sc_nebula_green"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Иего-Прайм"
		class = "pc_nebula_green"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_green_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Иего"
		class = pc_mesa
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = yes
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_iego
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_iego
				entity = continental_iego_planet_01_entity
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = extensive_moon_system
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Иего-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Иего-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Миллиус-Прайм"
			class = pc_outback
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			entity = "swp_desert_planet_01_entity"
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Иего XXI"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Альтратонне"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270

			}
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = @normal_planet_max_size

				min = 2
				max = 2
			}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}

				add_modifier = {
					modifier = high_gravity
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

			max = 270
		}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

		canon_map
	}

		name = "Дандриан-Прайм"

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 5

# Voss
voss_system_initializer = {
	name = "Восс"
	class = "sc_k"
	planet = {
		name = "Восс-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Восс I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Восс II"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Восс IIa"
			class = pc_molten
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Восс IIb"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Восс IIc"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Восс IId"
			class = pc_toxic
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Восс"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 340
			max = 20
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_voss
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_VossPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Voss_Mystics"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_imperial_cult
							civic = civic_functional_architecture
						}
						authority = auth_imperial
						species = event_target:VossSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = voss_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Voss"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Луна Восс"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Восс IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Восс IVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Восс V"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		canon_map
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		}

# Brigia
brigia_system_initializer = {
	name = "Бригия"
	class = "sc_k"
	planet = {
		name = "Бригия-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Бригия I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бригия II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Бригия IIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бригия"
		class = pc_forest
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_brigia
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_BrigianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Brigian_Territory"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_increasing_urbanization
							civic = civic_atmospheric_pollution
						}
						authority = random
						species = event_target:BrigianSpecies
						ethos = random
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = brigian_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Brigia"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бригия IV"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Бригия IVa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

# Raxus

	name = "Раксус"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Раксус"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Раксус-Прайм"
		class = pc_lake
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = "toxic_planet_02_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_raxus_shipyards
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Раксус II"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}

			min = 3
			max = 6
		}

			max = 120
		}

			max = 6
		}

# Kesh
kesh_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кеш"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Кеш-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кеш"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_kesh
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Кеш-I"
			class = pc_barren

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			}
		}

			max = 4

			max = 25
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

# Rothana
rothana_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ротана"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Ротана-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ротана"
		class = pc_antarctic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_rothana_shipyards
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_RothanianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Rothanian_Authority"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_distinguished_admiralty
							civic = civic_citizen_service
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:RothanianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = rothanian_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Rothana"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Geonosis
geonosis_system_initializer = {
	name = "Джеонозис"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "Эа"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Джерисс"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Джерисс-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Джеонозис"
		class = pc_hadesert
		orbit_distance = 50
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = yes
		entity = "desert_geonosis_planet_01_entity"
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_geonosis
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = pm_droid_foundry
			}
			add_deposit = d_badlands_n'g'zi
			add_deposit = d_e'y-akh_desert
			add_deposit = d_im'g'twe_hills
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_GeonosianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Geonosian_Hive"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_aristocratic_elite
							civic = civic_functional_architecture
						}
						authority = auth_imperial
						species = event_target:GeonosianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = geonosian_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					add_building = building_droid_factory
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Geonosis"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Джеонозис-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270

				max = 4
			}
		}

# Huldamun
huldamun_system_initializer = {
	name = "Халдамун"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		drone_destroyer_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
			}
			set_deposit = d_minerals_8
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Asset_Protection_Unit"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 7
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Халдамун-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Халдамун"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Шаум-Хай"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

# Vinsoth

		canon_map

		}

		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

			max = 270
		}
	}

polus_system_initializer = {
	name = "Авиндия"
	class = "sc_binary_1"
	flags = {
		rebel_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Авиндия-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Авиндия II"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Полус"
		class = pc_subarctic
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = hazardous_weather
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Polus Minor"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

				min = 90

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "Ласиль-II"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270

			size = {

			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Коратас"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Датомир-III"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Датомир-IV"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {

# Drackmar

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_salin_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дракмар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

			}

		}

			max = @normal_planet_max_size

	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			modifier = sy_entralla_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ют-Прайм"

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			min = 90

				max = 5
			}

# Orinda
orinda_system_initializer = {
	name = "Оринда"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		drone_destroyer_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_entralla_route
		}
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
			}
			set_deposit = d_minerals_8
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Asset_Protection_Unit"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 7
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Оринда-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size

	}

# Ord Trasi
ord_trasi_system_initializer = {
	name = "Орд-Траси"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		rebel_start_system
		canon_map
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Орд-Траси-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Орд-Траси"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = "continental_planet_01_entity"
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_rich_mountain
			add_deposit = d_ord_trasi_shipyards
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 6
						generate_OrdTrasianPop = yes
					}
					while = {
						count = 6
						generate_WookieePop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Ord_Trasi_Monarchy"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_mining_guilds
							civic = civic_distinguished_admiralty
						}
						authority = auth_imperial
						species = event_target:OrdTrasianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = ord_trasi_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Ord Trasi"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Орд-Траси-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			init_effect = {
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						add_deposit = d_minerals_4
					}
					25 = {
						add_deposit = d_minerals_3
					}
					25 = {
						add_deposit = d_minerals_5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Орд-Траси-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			init_effect = {
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						add_deposit = d_minerals_4
					}
					25 = {
						add_deposit = d_minerals_3
					}
					25 = {
						add_deposit = d_minerals_5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Imdaar
imdaar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Имдаар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Имдаар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Имдаар"
		class = pc_wetswamp
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		# Pirate Country - Bloody Claw
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Имдаар Альфа"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			max = 4

			max = 25

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {

				max = 2
			}

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 90

		}

# Aeten
aeten_system_initializer = {
	name = "Эйтен"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tiyanki_home_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		create_tiyanki_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant
			}
			save_event_target_as = giant
			event_target:tiyanki_country = {
				save_event_target_as = tiyanki_country2
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_1 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_2 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_3 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_4 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_5 = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Эйтен"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Эйтен I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Эйтен II"
		class = pc_searing
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Эйтен III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Эйтен IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		canon_map

	}

		class = "pc_nebula_purple"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_purple_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
}

		canon_map
	}

		name = "Дженерис"
		class = star

		size = {

			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Атривис"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no	
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = high_gravity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Атривис VII"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no	
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		class = pc_gas_giant

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

				min = 2
				max = 4

# Doan
doan_system_initializer = {
	name = "Доан"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		rebel_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Доан-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Доан"
		class = pc_outback
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no	
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

	name = "Орд Тоден"

		name = "Звезда Орд Тоден"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_primal

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = unstable_tectonics
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

# Kalee
kalee_system_initializer = {
	name = "Калии"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "Iminec"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Прелли"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Норбон"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Малый Аббаджи"
		class = pc_cascadian
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Малый Аббаджи I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Малый Аббаджи II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Калии"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_kalee
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_KaleeshPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Kaleesh_Territory"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_warrior_culture
							civic = civic_imperial_cult
						}
						authority = auth_imperial
						species = event_target:KaleeshSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = cis_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = kaleesh_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Kalee"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Калии I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ремш"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Ремш-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Ремш-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		
		moon = {
			name = "Ремш-XV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Эльк"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Huk
huk_system_initializer = {
	name = "Хук"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Хук-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Хук"
		class = pc_forest
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_huk
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_YamriiPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Yamrii_Authority"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_distinguished_admiralty
							civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:YamriiSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = yamrii_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Huk"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Траэнус"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 30

			max = 270
		}

			max = 35
		}

		}

			max = 15
		}

		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			min = 90

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

				max = 270

# Ventooine

	name = "Вентуин"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Вентуин-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_ventooine
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вентуин"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Droecil

	name = "Дроэсил"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_harrin_trade_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дроэсил-Прайм"

		orbit_distance = 0

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 1

				max = 5

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Лохопа II"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Лохопа III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Лохопа IV"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

# Kira
kira_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кира"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		naboo_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_harrin_trade_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кира"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 55
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 85
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 115
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Кира I"
		class = pc_shattered
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кира II"
		class = pc_shattered_2
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кира III"
		class = pc_shattered
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no

# Momansi
momansi_system_initializer = {
	name = "Моманси"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		drone_destroyer_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_harrin_trade_corridor
		}
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
			}
			set_deposit = d_minerals_8
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Asset_Protection_Unit"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 7
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Моманси"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 175
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

	name = "Алисандор"

		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Алисандор"
		class = star

			max = 35
		}

	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

	}

		}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

		}

		}

			}
		}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

#############################
# Middle Trailing Sectors
#############################
# Tyus Cluster
tyus_cluster_system_initializer = {
	name = "Скопление Тиус"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	planet = {
		name = "Скопление Тиус A"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Скопление Тиус B"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Скопление Тиус C"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Haruun Kal
haruun_kal_system_initializer = {
	name = "Ал'Хар"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "Ал'Хар"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Харуун Кал"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_haruun_kal
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_KorunPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Balawai_Representative_Council"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_idealistic_foundation
							civic = civic_environmentalist
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:KorunSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_03
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = korunnai_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Haruun Kal"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

	}

			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Кериба I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		name = "Кериба II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Кериба IIa"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кериба III"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Каларба"
		class = pc_desertislands
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty

				min = 90

				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Индорок"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кериба V"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кериба VI"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable

			min = 90

		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Аргус"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		canon_map

			max = 10

			min = 90

				max = 5

# Azzameen (Station)
azzameen_system_initializer = {
	name = "Аззамеен"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Аззамеен-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Аззамеен"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			create_ambient_object = {
				type = "swnd_ambient_familybase"
				location = this
			}
			last_created_ambient_object = {
				set_location = {
					target = prev
					distance = 10
					angle = 30
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}


# Omwat
omwat_system_initializer = {
	name = "Омват"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Омват-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Омват"
		class = pc_prairie
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_omwat
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_OmwatiPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Omwati_Junta"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_warrior_culture
							civic = civic_byzantine_bureaucracy
						}
						authority = auth_oligarchic
						species = event_target:OmwatiSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = omwati_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Omwat"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Dravian Station
dravian_station_system_initializer = {
	name = "Дравийская станция"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Звезда Дравийской станции"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Дравийская станция"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Sevarcos

			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Севаркос II"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size

		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Котельер-I"
			class = pc_forest
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			has_ring = yes
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

				max = 6

				min = 90

		name = "Звезда Спайс Терминус"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Спайс Терминус"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		}
	}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}

				modifier = atmospheric_aphrodisiac

			name = "Загоба-I"

				min = 90

	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			max = 10

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
