# Verdanth
verdanth_system_initializer = {
	name = "Вердант"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		cis_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вердант-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вердант"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			max = 30
		}

	}

		name = "Ламарекк"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 10
		orbit_angle = 20
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ламаредд"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ламаремм"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 215
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# New Balosar
new_balosar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Новый Балосар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Звезда нового Балосара"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Новый Балосар"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_BalosarPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_New_Balosar_Colony"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_free_haven
							civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:BalosarSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_materialist"
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = kiffar_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "New Balosar"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

petabys_station_system_initializer = {
	name = "Станция Петаби"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Звезда станции Петаби"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Станция Петаби"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Upper Western Reaches
###########################
# Cilpar
cilpar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Силпар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Силпар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Силпар"
		class = pc_hajungle
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Laakteen Depot
laakteen_depot_system_initializer = {
	name = "Лаактин"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Лаактин-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Склад Лаактина"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Vaykaaris
vaykaaris_system_initializer = {
	name = "Вайкаарис"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Вайкаарис-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вайкаарис"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Zardossa Stix
zardossa_stix_system_initializer = {
	name = "Зардосса-Стикс"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Зардосса-Стикс-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Зардосса"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Зардосса-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Зардосса-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Зардосса-III"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Зардосса-Стикс"
			class = pc_desert
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Зардосса-V"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Bardotta
bardotta_system_initializer = {
	name = "Бардотта"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Бардотта-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бардотта"
		class = pc_highland
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = low_gravity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Phu
phu_system_initializer = {
	name = "Фу"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Фу-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фу"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Tasar
tasar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Тасар"
	class = "sc_a"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_tasar
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Гайрлат"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Аргану"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_minerals_6
			add_deposit = d_alloys_2
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тасарик"
		class = pc_karst
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Луна Тасарик"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тренал"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Тренал-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тренал-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тренал-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тренал-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тренал-V"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Тренал-XIV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 190
	}
}

# Taloraan
taloraan_system_initializer = {
	name = "Келавайн"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Келавайн"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Талораан"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

			name = "Талораан-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Талораан-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "Талораан-III"
			class = random_non_colonizable

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Талораан-IV"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Талораан-VII"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Kayri
kayri_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кайри"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Кайри"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Кайри I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кайри II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

# Llon Nebulae
llon_nebulae_system_initializer = {
	name = "Скопление Ллон"
	class = "sc_nebula_red"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = amoeba_home_system
		create_amoeba_home_fleet_1 = yes
		create_amoeba_home_fleet_2 = yes
		create_amoeba_home_roaming_fleets = yes
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Скопление Ллон"
		class = "pc_nebula_red"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_star
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_star
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Space_Amoebas_United"
				type = amoeba_garrison
				flag = {
					icon = {
						category = "zoological"
						file = "flag_zoological_1.dds"
					}
					background = {
						category = "backgrounds"
						file = "00_solid.dds"
					}
					colors = {
						"black"
						"black"
						"null"
						"null"
					}
				}
				effect = {
					save_global_event_target_as = amoeba_garrison_country
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = event_target:amoeba_country
						}
						set_faction_hostility = {
							set_hostile = no
							set_neutral = yes
							target = event_target:amoeba_country
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_ambient_object = {
				type = "space_storm_1"
				location = this
			}
			last_created_ambient_object = {
				set_location = {
					target = prev
					distance = 5
					angle = 180
				}
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		class = pc_gas_giant
		size = 42
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		has_ring = no
		flags = {
			amoeba_giant1
		}
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_giant
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 1
				max = 4
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 42
		orbit_angle = 45
		size = 5
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_ice_asteroid_1
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_ice_asteroid_1
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 133
		size = 5
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_ice_asteroid_2
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_ice_asteroid_2
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 107
		size = 5
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_ice_asteroid_3
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_ice_asteroid_3
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
}

# Kiffu
kiffu_system_initializer = {
	name = "Киффу"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Солнце Киффу"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Киффу"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_kiffu
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_KiffarPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Kiffar_Sovereignty"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_idealistic_foundation
							civic = civic_environmentalist
						}
						authority = auth_democratic
						species = event_target:KiffarSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
							ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = kiffar_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Kiffu"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Киффекс"
		class = pc_mesa
		orbit_distance = 6
		orbit_angle = 10
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = lush_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

lutrillia_system_initializer = {

			max = 3

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Лутриллия"
		class = pc_tundra
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_lutrillia
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

				max = 5

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

			}
		}
	}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

				max = 5
			}

		}

			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кассидо"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_kassido
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

	name = "Тиналлис"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		juvex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тиналлис-Прайм"

		orbit_distance = 0

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

			max = 3

			max = 10

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {

				max = 1

				max = 5
			}

# Vulcar
vulcar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Вулкар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		juvex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вулкар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Вулкар"
		class = pc_searing
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Hestria
hestria_system_initializer = {
	name = "Хестрия"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Хестрия-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Хестрия"
		class = pc_prairie
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = lush_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

	name = "Тибрин"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Тибрин-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Тибрин"
		class = pc_desertislands
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_tibrin
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Плах"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				max = 6

				min = 90

				max = 5
			}

	}
}

		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Орелл"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Силерон"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Силерон-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Силерон-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Верон"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = 3

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

		nebula_system

			name = "Эйатту VIIc"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эйатту VIIt"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Эйатту VIII"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			max = 10

		orbit_distance = 30

			max = 270
		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

		}

			max = 270

			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Орд-Ибанна-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		}

		}

				max = 5

# Riflor
riflor_system_initializer = {
	name = "Рифлории"
	class = "sc_riflor"
	flags = {
		cerean_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Рифлор A"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Рифлор B"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 15
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Рифлор C"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 15
		orbit_angle = 150
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Зирку"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Рифлор"
		class = pc_searing
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Рифлор-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Рифлор-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Рифлор-VI"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Теджривож"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Koba
koba_system_initializer = {
	name = "Коба"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		cerean_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Коба-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Коба"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Коба-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Sarrish
sarrish_system_initializer = {
	name = "Сарриш"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		koorivar_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Сарриш-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Сарриш"
		class = pc_alpine
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_sarrish
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = extensive_moon_system
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Сарриш-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сарриш-II"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сарриш-VII"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_arctic

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 2

				min = 90

			}

				min = 2

			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Anoat
anoat_system_initializer = {
	name = "Аноат"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		javin_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Аноат-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 35
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Мир Кьюда"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Винза"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

	planet = {

		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Дорвалла-I"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Mustafar
mustafar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Мустафар"
	class = "sc_k"
	planet = {
		name = "Приат"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Шада"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Джестефад"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Мустафар"
		class = pc_searing
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = "searing_planet_01_entity"
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_mustafar
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Лефрани"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "Нур"
			class = pc_ocean
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Риетта-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Риетта-II"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 60

# Subterrel
subterrel_system_initializer = {
	name = "Сабтеррел"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Сабтеррел-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Сабтеррел"
		class = pc_karst
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_subterrel
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = karst
			}
		}
		entity = "toxic_planet_01_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

# Red Nebula
red_nebula_system_initializer = {
	name = "Красная Туманность"
	class = "sc_nebula_red"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		amoeba_1_system
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					settings = {
						garrison = yes
					}
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						set_formation_scale = 3
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = red_nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Красная Туманность"
		class = "pc_nebula_red"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Планета красной Туманности"
		class = pc_outback
		orbit_distance = 50
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		entity = "barren_planet_mars_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_of_the_red_nebula
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_RedHumanoidPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Crimson_Council"						# TODO incorrect auth/civics combo
						civics = {
							civic = civic_imperial_cult
							civic = civic_functional_architecture
						}
						authority = auth_imperial
						species = event_target:RedHumanoidSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"
							ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = red_nebula_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "Planet of the Nebula"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Needan
needan_system_initializer = {
	name = "Неедан"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Неедан-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Неедан"
		class = pc_snow
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = asteroid_impacts
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Endor
endor_system_initializer = {
	name = "Эндор"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Иблим"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Эндор (Тана)"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор I"
			class = pc_molten
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор III"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор IV"
			class = pc_toxic
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор V"
			class = pc_toxic
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор VI"
			class = pc_molten
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор VII"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Сестра-Луна"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Эндор"
			class = pc_forest
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			entity = "forest_endor_planet_01_entity"
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = planet_endor
				prevent_anomaly = yes
				random_list = {
					100 = {
						while = {
							count = 12
							generate_Ewok = yes
						}
						create_country = {
							name = "NAME_Ewok_Tribe"
							civics = {
								civic = civic_environmentalist
								civic = civic_functional_architecture
							}
							authority = auth_oligarchic
							species = event_target:Ewok_Species
							ethos = {
								ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"
								ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
							}
							type = primitive
						}
						last_created_country = {
							set_graphical_culture = misc_01
							set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
							set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
							save_global_event_target_as = ewok_faction
						}
						add_building = building_primitive_capital
						add_building = building_primitive_farm
						add_building = building_primitive_mine
						add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
						add_building = building_primitive_factory
						add_building = building_urban_dwellings
						last_created_country = {
							capital_scope = {
								set_name = "Forest Moon of Endor"
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Элогги"
		class = pc_frozen_desert
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Мегиддо"
		class = pc_barren_cold
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Дор"
		class = pc_barren_cold
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			max = 3

###########################
# Din Pulsar
din_pulsar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Дин Пульсар"
	class = "sc_pulsar"
	planet = {
		name = "Дин Пульсар"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
}

# Endor Gate
endor_gate_system_initializer = {
	name = "Врата Эндора"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	planet = {
		name = "Врата Эндора"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 20
			max = 20
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
}


# Cattamascar
cattamascar_system_initializer = {
	name = "Каттамаскар"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		bakuran_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Каттамаскар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Каттамаскар"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Lwhekk
lwhekk_system_initializer = {
	name = "Лвекк"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Лвекк-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Лвекк"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_lwhekk
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}


# Firrerre
firrerre_system_initializer = {
	name = "Фиррерр"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Фиррерр-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Фиррерр"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_firrerre
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Bunduki
bunduki_system_initializer = {
	name = "Бундуки"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Бундуки-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бундуки"
		class = pc_cascadian
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Бундуки-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		class = star

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {

				max = 5

				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Rattatak
rattatak_system_initializer = {
	name = "Гутер Уэйд"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Рек"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Наш"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no

			name = "Наш-I"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Зоге Вер"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 85

			max = 180

			max = 2

			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {

# Gannaria
gannaria_system_initializer = {
	name = "Геннария"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Геннария"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

# Zaddja

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0

				max = 5

				min = 90

		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Задджа"
		class = pc_desertislands
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90

		}

			}

				max = 5
			}

# O'reen
oreen_system_initializer = {
	name = "О'реен"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "О'реен-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "О'реен"
		class = pc_subarctic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_oreen
			random_list = {
				100 = {
					while = {
						count = 12
						generate_OreenianPop = yes
					}
					create_country = {
						name = "NAME_Oreenian_Dictatorship"
						civics = {
							civic = civic_nationalistic_zeal
							civic = civic_warrior_culture
						}
						authority = auth_dictatorial
						species = event_target:O'reenianSpecies
						ethos = {
							ethic = "ethic_fanatic_militarist"
							ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
						}
						type = primitive
					}
					last_created_country = {
						set_graphical_culture = misc_01
						set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
						set_primitive_age = sw_minor_faction
						save_global_event_target_as = oreenian_faction
					}
					add_building = building_primitive_capital
					add_building = building_primitive_farm
					add_building = building_primitive_mine
					add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
					add_building = building_primitive_factory
					add_building = building_urban_dwellings
					last_created_country = {
						capital_scope = {
							set_name = "O'reen"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "О'реен-I"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "О'реен-II"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {

			max = 10
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 1

				max = 5
			}

		}

			max = 25

				max = 5

# Rago
rago_system_initializer = {
	name = "Раго"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "Раго"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {

	}

		name = "Туманность Утегету"
		class = "pc_nebula_green"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1

			create_p_green_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
}

		class = random_asteroid

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

	name = "Веролим"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {

			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Веролим-Прайм"
		class = star

		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout

			max = 25

				max = 5

#Ilum
ilum_system_initializer = {
	name = "Илум"
	class = "sc_g"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = unknown_regions_ilum
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Азар"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Джайк"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Бори"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кала"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Илум"
		class = pc_frozen_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_ilum
			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
			add_deposit = d_holenesh_canyon
			add_deposit = d_icefall_cavern
			add_deposit = d_crystal_caves_ilum
			add_deposit = d_cross_shelf_corridor
			add_deposit = d_western_ice_shelf
			add_deposit = d_kyber_vein_2
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = mineral_rich
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Илум A"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "Илум B"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Троп"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Троп-I"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

# Crustai
crustai_system_initializer = {
	name = "Крустаи"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		elite_system
		crystal_home_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = yes
			}
			event_target:crystal_country = {
				save_event_target_as = elite1_owner
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Crystal_Nidus"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = "NAME_Crystal_Nidus"
							design = "NAME_Crystal_Nidus"
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 0
						}
						#set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						#set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						#set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ruby_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 5
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 9
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 19
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 72
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Topaz_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 14
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 16
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 144
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 20
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 216
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Emerald_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 16
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 288
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Крустаи-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Крустаи I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "Крустаи Ia"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Крустаи II"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

	planet = {

		class = pc_glacial
		orbit_distance = 40

			min = 90

		}

# Schesa
schesa_system_initializer = {
	name = "Счеса"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Счеса-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Счеса"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		}
	}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @normal_planet_min_size
			max = @normal_planet_max_size
		}
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_exegol
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

# Cormit
cormit_system_initializer = {
	name = "Кормит"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		chiss_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Кормит"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

		chiss_start_system
		canon_map

			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "Ригар-Прайм"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "Ригар I"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = @small_planet_max_size

			name = "Ригар-I"
			class = pc_forest
			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}

				min = 90

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

				min = 90
